parameters.name: TrackingID
parameters.description: Application-defined value for the tracking ID Value Action >0 Edge is tracked 0 Tracking of edge is stopped

title: IEdge.SetTrackingID
description: Assigns a tracking ID to this edge.
signature:
System.Int32 SetTrackingID( 
   System.Int32
TrackingCookie
,
   System.Int32
TrackingID
)

parameters.name: TrackingID
parameters.description: Application-defined value for the tracking ID Value Action >0 Edge is tracked 0 Tracking of edge is stopped

remarks:
You can assign tracking IDs to
bodies
, edges,
faces
,
loops
, and
vertices
in parts and assemblies only; you cannot assign tracking IDs to these entities in drawings. See
Tracking IDs
for more information.

examples.title: Get, Set, and Remove Tracking IDs on Edge (VBA)
